Text:
It was under the ‘sampige’ - 
 The fragrant champa tree
 That I waited for Ajji 
 To walk me home. 
 All along I’d ask her - 
 Neer dosa? Allugeda? Bhaath? 
 She’d simply shrug 
 Smiling indulgently

Lunch was a glorious affair 
 My joyous feet dangling. 
 Eyes hungry, mouth watering. 
 Awaiting Ajji’s spread

Next steps, videos. 
 Even Ajji’s jokes. 
 Are now online to see.

Innocent, 
 But still so much to learn. 
 But then that's exactly what makes us human.
 You're like a butterfly. 
 With wings

And a soul of your own. 
 Cant see your past because it's not there. 
 You've got a great big empty inside

And you can't see it because its not there. 
 But who cares if we can? 
 You're a dream within a dream
THINK: YOLO! Why limit yourself? You can transform many lives.
